body:
#### PR description:

Enables both positive and negative time shifts of the signal at the end of SIM.
**NB:** fixed code _is not used by default in any wfs. 
Can be used only with an appropriate customization for timing alignment tests/studies.     

#### PR validation:

Compiles,  private tests confirmed expected results.
title: HCAL: fix applyQIEdelay() for MC timing studies
